long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover the latest live sports scores and highlights with 'What's the Score?' – your ultimate sports companion. Stay updated on sports leagues like NBA, NFL and more. Whether you're a fan of basketball or football, we've got you covered. Choose your favorite league, get real-time scores, and enjoy the excitement of the game. Plus, you can support our extension too! 'What's the Score?' – Your one-stop destination for sports updates.
